happy: Celebrate your happiness with gratitude journaling today.
Share your joy with a friend or family member.
sad: Write down three things you’re grateful for today.
stressed: Do a 5-4-3-2-1 grounding technique to reduce anxiety.
Take a short walk outside and observe your surroundings.
angry: Practice deep belly breathing for 5 minutes.
Write down what made you angry and reflect on your triggers calmly.
anxious: Try progressive muscle relaxation for 10 minutes.
Write down your worries and rational responses to them.
frustrated: Take a short break and do some deep breathing to reset your mind.
Write down the main cause of your frustration and one small action to improve it.
confused: List out what is confusing you to gain clarity.
Take a 5-minute break and return to it with a fresh mind.
neutral: Write down one thing you’re looking forward to this week.
Step outside for a few deep breaths of fresh air.
